msbt.message: What's up, . You got a second? I wanna bug you about somethin', .
So, have you introduced yourself to yet?Maybe this is weird, but now that 's around, is feelin' like a whole new place.
And that got me wonderin'How do we make this place more welcoming for when someone else like comes along?I think maybe it's time to give a little more personality.
Don't get me wrong. I'm all about the vibe we've got going now. I just wanna amp it up some.

And to get that goin', I bought us something kinda rad. Do you think you could find a spot for it?Oh! Wait, hang on, hold up! Are your pocketsFULL?! After all that?Alright. Well, umOK, I guess I'll mail it to you.Anyway, once you see it, I know that YOU'LL know where to put it. You got this. Literally and figuratively.
And to get that goin', I bought us something kinda rad. Do you think you could find a spot for it?
I know that YOU know where oughta go, .Now get out there. You got this. Literally AND figuratively!
Yo! So told you about rollin' out the welcome wagon and stuff, right?
Well, I went and got something too! Do you think you could find a spot for it, ?
Oh. Except, uhit looks like your pockets are full. Well, whatever. I'll just mail it to you.I bet once you get your hands on it, you'll know exactly where it oughta go. I trust ya!
I know that YOU know where oughta go, .Now get out there. You got this. Literally AND figuratively!
